I came this morning to the Egyptian Museum and found that some had tried to raid the museum by force last night," Zahi Hawass , chairperson of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, said on Saturday. Egyptian citizens tried to prevent them and were joined by the tourism police, but some( looters) managed to enter from above and they destroyed two of the mummies, he said. . "We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time," said Eric Schmidt , who joined Google as CEO in 2001. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come.
